targets.query: SELECT mean("rootFree") FROM "naametrics" WHERE ("systemName" =~ /^$host$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(previous)

SELECT (last("memcacheGetHits") / ( last("memcacheGetMisses" ) + last("memcacheGetHits"))) * 100 FROM "naametrics" WHERE ("systemName" =~ /^$host$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
